LanguageData.SupportFullDoomsday: Help is fully staffed. You can not take more frctions.

LanguageData.DoomsdayDesc: The {0} faction gathered to arrange a kawabanga on this planet. We can try to collect the missing amount, or maybe other factions will be able to help in the raid on their base?
